pages.text: We just need to make them better. UhUh upgrades. $(br) $(li) Speed Upgrade $(li) Bonus Upgrade $(li) Reinforcement Upgrade
$(br) §l§4Can apply on:§r All. $(br2) §l§6Effect:§r Pretty much explanatory. (But... It reduces 20 ticks for each speed upgrade)
$(br) §l§4Can apply on:§r Auto Sieve, Auto Hammer. $(br2) §l§6Effect:§r 25% chance of getting a double output for each bonus upgrade.
$(br) §l§4Can apply on:§r Auto Hammer. $(br2) §l§6Effect:§r Ability to hammer the compressed blocks. If this is applied you also need a reinforced hammer to hammer the compressed blocks.
